title: Index
content:
CommentComponent(kind=text, text=Reference to an indexed , value=) CommentComponent(kind=typeName, text=AstNode, value=kwasm.ast.AstNode) CommentComponent(kind=text, text= in the AST.

From the docs:


typeidx(I)     ::= x:u32   => x
v:id    => x (if I.types[x] = v)
funcidx(I)     ::= x:u32   => x
v:id    => x (if I.funcs[x] = v)
tableidx(I)    ::= x:u32   => x
v:id    => x (if I.tables[x] = v)
memidx(I)      ::= x:u32   => x
v:id    => x (if I.mems[x] = v)
globalidx(I)   ::= x:u32   => x
v:id    => x (if I.globals[x] = v)
lacalidx(I)    ::= x:u32   => x
v:id    => x (if I.locals[x] = v)
labelidx(I)    ::= l:u32   => l
v:id    => l (if I.labels[l] = v)
, value=null)
